segments.text: Hey , man , look , what's on the wall over there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you know that ? It's all about new office rules .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It says smoking is not allowed in any private offices . It might be the most terrible thing for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can smoke outside of the office . But what else does it say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want to ask for leave , you should get the approval from the manager in charge of your department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if there is an emergency and the manager is of absence , what should we do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The note says you should call your manager first , and then tell him your reason , and then ask him for the approval .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , OK , got it . By the way , what about the vacation policy ? Anything changed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . We still enjoy 10 - day of paid vacation per year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can we have 7 - day holiday on National Day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . That's what we deserve .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have something else to remind you of . Don't be late , if you are late , you will be fined 20 Yuan per minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? I always get up late . Oh , my God . Can't believe that . That is terrible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So remember to set your alarm clock .
segments.speaker: S2
